::Ramulus::

Ramulus smiles at SnowCat, turning his head to look at her. "You're welcome 
again. I know how you feel. I wandered this planet for years before I found 
the Maximals."

He stops at the CR chambers, motioning to them. "Here we are, the CR 
chambers."
